mentionedBy.name: ANSYS Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: High-performance FEA tool known for nonlinear simulations, hyperelastic materials, crash tests, and advanced material modeling. Handles nonlinear and high-deformation simulations more gracefully than ANSYS Mechanical.
